barbarianoptional.description: Provides the Instinctive Pounce optional feature at 7th level.

bardoptional.description: Provides the Magical Inspiration optional feature at 2nd level.

clericoptional.description: Provides the Harness Divine Power optional feature at 2nd level.

druidoptional.description: Provides the Wild Companion optional feature at 2nd level.

monkoptional.description: Provides the Ki-Fueled Attack, Quickened Healing and Focused Aim optional features at 3rd, 4th and 5th levels, respectively.

paladinoptional.description: Provides the Harness Divine Power optional feature at 3rd level.

rangeroptional.description: Provides the Favored Foe optional feature as a choice amongst the Favored Enemy features at 1st level and provides the Deft Explorer optional features as additional choices for the Natural Explorer feature at 1st, 6th and 10th levels.

rogueoptional.description: Provides the Steady Aim optional feature at 3rd level.

sorcereroptional.description: Provides the Magical Guidance optional feature at 5th level.
